definition: classifier for years (of age)/year/year (of crop harvests)
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: The revenue is derived from the following sources.
We began to do that job last year.
sentences.chinese: 咱們客歲入手下手做那工作的。

sentences.english: To recover the King's revenues was as important as to assert his prerogative.
sentences.chinese: 恢復英王的歲入同確保他的特權同等重要。

sentences.english: The government got much revenue from taxes last year.
sentences.chinese: 政府去年通過稅收穫得了大量歲入。

sentences.english: However, tariffs and custom duties, which were significant sources of revenue dried up.
sentences.chinese: 然而作爲國家重要歲入來源的關稅卻因此被榨乾。

definition: old variant of 補缺|补缺[bu3 que1]
Rizhilu or Record of daily study, by early Confucian philosopher Gu Yanwu 顧炎武|顾炎武
Baopuzi, collection of essays by Ge Hong 葛洪[Ge3 Hong2] on alchemy, immortality, legalism, society etc
see 呂洞賓|吕洞宾[Lu:3 Dong4 bin1]
to know how to count and do sums/numerate/numeracy
to evaluate the merit of sth
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
Zhang Juzheng (1525-1582), Grand Secretary during the Ming dynasty, credited with bringing the dynasty to its apogee
booklet/brochure/(old) book (made of bamboo strips tied together)
Guliang Annals, commentary on the Spring and Autumn Annals 春秋[Chun1 qiu1], first published during the Han Dynasty
